msbt.message: Excuse me? Why no, I am not an employee here.Though I AM dressed rather fabulously, so I can understand why you made that mistake.
Are you here because you've developed an interest in fashion?
One must be daring when it comes to fashion, darling. Today I shall take a chance on something unexpected!
I'm looking for an item that truly speaks to me. Something stylish, but also profound. You understand.

If you want to develop your fashion sense, I recommend you try on as many clothing items as possible. You must expand your horizons, my dear. Now go on! Grab some things and ask Mabel to let you try them on.

If you want to step up your style, then you must be bold! Try on lots of clothes! Expand your horizons! Whatever you do, don't be shy. If something catches your eye, just ask Mabel to let you try it on!

I see you, too, are an admirer of fine fashion. If not, you wouldn't travel so far to visit a tailor! I'm intrigued by the attire found on other islands too. You might say I'm a far-flung fashion aficionado!
If you like, why don't you buy something as a memento of today?Every time you gaze upon it, you'll remember this island Wouldn't that be lovely, ?
I am SO pleased the tailor shop has opened on the island.Now that it's here, I expect everyone to step up their fashion game, .

I've been hoping the tailor shop would open for QUITE some time. So let me be the first to say HURRAY FOR FASHION! To think a shop of this kind has opened on this very island! And I hear the fashions change every day. EVERY! SINGLE! DAY! Dreams DO come true, .
What a fabulous store this is. I can already tell I'll be spending far too much time here. But what can I do, ? When fashion callsI must answer!
